participant_1.background:
I am allergic to dogs.
I am colorblind.
My mother was not part of my life.
I went into the army after high school.

participant_2.background:
I play a lot of fantasy videogames.
I like to build model spaceships.
I have a computer science degree.
My mother is a medical doctor.
I am very shy.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing fantasy videogames and building model spaceships.
That's cool! I used to play a lot of videogames when I was younger.
What kind of videogames did you play?
I used to play a lot of role-playing games, like The Elder Scrolls and Baldur's Gate.
I've never played any of those games, but I've heard good things about them.
They're great games! I highly recommend them.
I'll have to check them out sometime.
You're welcome. So, what do you like about building model spaceships?
I love the challenge of building something from a kit. It's also really satisfying to see the finished product.
I can see how that would be fun. I've never built a model spaceship before, but it sounds like something I'd enjoy.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read, watch movies, and go hiking.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like science fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love the way science fiction and fantasy can transport you to another world.
I know what you mean. I love that feeling of being lost in a good book.
Me too! So, what are some of your favorite science fiction and fantasy books?
I have a lot of favorites, but some of my favorites include "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" by Douglas Adams, "Ender's Game" by Orson Scott Card, and "The Lord of the Rings" by J.R.R. Tolkien.
Those are all great books! I've read all of them except "The Lord of the Rings".
You should definitely read it! It's a classic.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
